sourcesContent:
<mat-grid-list cols={{numGames}} rowHeight=1:1>
    <mat-grid-tile
        *ngFor="let tile of tiles"
        [colspan]="tile.cols"
        [rowspan]="tile.rows"
        [style.background]="tile.color">
        <!---<app-matchup-card></app-matchup-card>--->
        <app-matchup-card></app-matchup-card>
    </mat-grid-tile>
</mat-grid-list>

<!---
<mat-grid-list cols="1" rowHeight="4:1">
    <mat-grid-tile><app-matchup-card></app-matchup-card></mat-grid-tile>
    <mat-grid-tile>2</mat-grid-tile>
    <mat-grid-tile>3</mat-grid-tile>
    <mat-grid-tile>4</mat-grid-tile>
</mat-grid-list>
--->
